00027 class InstrumentationCoreTestRunner: public InstrumentationTestRunner {
00028     private:
00029     class TersePrinter: public ::testing::EmptyTestEventListener {

00032                 gaia::core::Instrumentation* instrumentation);

00036         void OnTestProgramStart(
00037                 const ::testing::UnitTest& /* unit_test */);
00038 
00039         // Called after all test activities have ended.
00040         void OnTestProgramEnd(const ::testing::UnitTest& unit_test);

00044

00047                 const ::testing::TestPartResult& test_part_result);
00048 
00049         // Called after a test ends.
